definition: third of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/third in order/letter "C" or Roman "III" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/ancient Chinese compass point: 165°/propyl
sour/tart/sick at heart/grieved/sore/aching/pedantic/impractical/to make sarcastic remarks about sb/an acid

sentences.english: Chemical modification was carried out by the radical polymerization of KH-570 and acrylate monomer.
sentences.chinese: 改性后的树脂具有丙烯酸树脂和有机硅聚合物的优点。

sentences.english: Synthetic resin of acrylate was prepared with solution polymerization.
sentences.chinese: 用溶液聚合法制备丙烯酸酯合成树脂。

sentences.english: Oils and acrylics can be repaired.
sentences.chinese: 油画颜料和丙烯酸都可以得到修复。

sentences.english: Acrylic blankets and shawls are both warm and washable.
sentences.chinese: 丙烯酸纤维的毯子和围巾又保暖又耐洗。

sentences.english: Composite globe structure in transparent acrylic lucite .
sentences.chinese: 采用透明丙烯酸树脂合成球状结构。

sentences.english: The crosslinking characteristics of a number of diallyl esters toward methyl acrylate is compared in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 比较了几种双烯丙脂与丙烯酸甲酯共聚的交联性能。

sentences.english: The grafting of acrylic acid onto a polyethylene film by the pre-irradiation method was investigated.
sentences.chinese: 采用预辐射法研究了丙烯酸对聚乙烯膜的接枝反应。

sentences.english: Acrylics may also be modified with other resins.
sentences.chinese: 丙烯酸也可以被其它树脂改性。

sentences.english: PUA has good wear resistance and flexibility advantages.
sentences.chinese: 聚氨酯丙烯酸酯具有耐磨性好，柔韧性好的优点。

sentences.english: It’s less reflective than black acrylic paint.
sentences.chinese: 它的反射能力甚至比黑色丙烯酸涂料还差。

sentences.english: The polyacrylate nano-particle has been prepared by use of emulsion polymerization technology.
sentences.chinese: 通过乳液聚合，制备了聚丙烯酸酯纳米粒子。

sentences.english: The acrylate was copolymerized with the second monomer.
sentences.chinese: 寻找一种第二单体与丙烯酸酯共聚。

sentences.english: The synthesis method of stiffening agent was introduced in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了利用丙烯酸酯核壳共聚乳液生产硬挺剂的方法。

sentences.english: The title cationic epoxy acrylic resin was synthesized with the method of free-radical solution polymerization.
sentences.chinese: 采用自由基溶液聚合法合成了阳离子环氧丙烯酸树脂。

sentences.english: A new kind of thermosetting epoxy modified acrylic varnish for metallic electroplated parts was developed.
sentences.chinese: 研制出一种金属电镀件热固性环氧改型丙烯酸清漆。

sentences.english: FT-IR indicated that acrylic acid was grafted on alga.
sentences.chinese: IR初步表明了丙烯酸与海藻的接枝聚合作用。
